summary: A low-level drug pusher is pressured by a corrupt cop to help him catch a local drug lord.
cast: Seung-bum Ryoo|Jung-min Hwang|Hee-ra Kim|Ja-Hyeon Chu|Do-gyung Lee|Joo-Wan On|Woo Jung|Shin Jeong-geun|Jin-hyeok Kim|Yoo Jae-Myung|Myeong-gap Jang|Choi Jin-ho|Won-jae Kang|Young-woong Kim|Jae-Young Yang|Eol Lee
title: Sasaeng gyeoldan
